text:
12：05-12：10 長官介紹
時間：113年10月25日（五）12：00（開放入場）
將分享利用深度學習技術對系集模擬數據進行數據縮減和參數空間探索
講者：資工系 王科植 副教授
主題演講：深度學習技術用於系集模擬數據處理與相關應用
活動安排：
地點：公館校區 理學院大樓1樓（物理系前）
活動海報請參閱附件，敬請協助轉知分享，期待您的踴躍參與
trans:
12:05-12:10 Introduction by the Director
Time: October 25, 2024 (Friday) 12:00 (Doors open)
The speaker will share how deep learning techniques are used to reduce data and explore the parameter space of system simulation data.
Speaker: Associate Professor Wang Kezhi, Department of Computer Science
Keynote: Application of Deep Learning Techniques in System Simulation Data Processing and Related Applications
Event Schedule:
Location: Building 1, College of Science, Gongguan Campus (In front of the Physics Department)
For the event poster, please refer to the attachment. Kindly assist in sharing this information, and we look forward to your active participation.
